item.title: How to Deploy an OpenVPN Server on OpenWrt 19.07
item.description:
ðŸ“Œ This should also work on the current OpenWrt 21.02 release candidate.

This guide outlines how to configure an OpenWrt gateway as a OpenVPN server, which is perfect for providing secure remote access to your local network from anywhere.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: About
item.description: This website is perpetually under development, especially now that I’m learning and migrating to Hugo. Everything worthwhile is getting converted to Markdown!

item.title: Resume
item.description:
Robert LaRocca

A well-rounded and reliable Linux Systems Administrator, able to streamline operations, develop tools for process automation, harden information security and increase systems availability using: modern technology, leading open-source software, professional experience and proven track-record.
